repository.corpname: Archives & Special Collections at the Thomas J. Dodd Research Center, University of Connecticut Libraries

did.abstract: The collection contains correspondence, notes, articles and publications created or collected by Mr. Bender during his tenure in the University of Connecticut, Cooperative Extension Service.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The collection contains publications and course related materials by Mr. Bender's areas of expertise of agriculture and resource economics in his role as Senior Extension Educator and Center Coordinator, Cooperative Extension System.

bioghist.head: Biography/History
bioghist.p: Norman Bender was Senior Extension Educator and Center Coordinator, New London County Extension Center from 1978 until his retirement in April 2011. Bender was was associated with the Connecticut Sea Grant Marine Advisory Program. He later was involved with the College of Agriculture and Natural Resources’ Agriculture Risk Management Program, which he co-developed and led the team for several years. The risk management program is now one of Extension’s key agricultural offerings. An agricultural economist by training, Bender served Extension statewide and was a leader in many aspects of agriculture and resource economics over the years, including ag tourism, marketing, and risk management, to mention a few.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The collection is open and available for research.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use and Copyright Information
userestrict.p: Permission to publish from these Papers must be obtained in writing from both the University of Connecticut Libraries and the owner(s) of the copyright.

acqinfo.head: Provenance and Acquisition
acqinfo.p: The collection was donated to the University Archives by Dr. Bender in 2012.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Item description, #:#], Norman Bender Papers. Archives & Special Collections at the Thomas J. Dodd Research Center, University of Connecticut Libraries.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Archives & Special Collections has a substantial collection of materials pertaining to the University, its history, administration, faculty, staff and students, etc. For detailed information on these collections please contact the curator or ask at the Reading Room desk.

did.unittitle: Transcripts, ephemera, correspondence, publications, notes, fliers, clippings, videocassette,

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Flier on "Farm Transfer Network of New England;" Undated Meeting minutes from "University of Connecticut Cooperative Extension System: Advisory Committee Meeting: Connecticut Sea Grant Advisory Program" (May 18, 1994); 1987-1994 Sea Grant Marine Advisory Program meeting minutes and agendas; agenda for event "Connecticut Marina and Boatyard Conference" (January 12, 1982); 1982 "Publication 595" meeting agenda;

Documents by Norman K. Bender, of the Cooperative Extension Service: Marine Advisory Service (CES: MAS) on "The Importance of Financial Records in Charter Boat Operations," "The Commercial Striped Bass Fishery in Connecticut," "Marine Financing in Connecticut," "Tax Incentive Policies for the Commercial Fishing Industry: Planning Ahead to Reduce Taxes," "Budgeting in a Marine Business" (By Norman K. Bender and Billy V. Lessley), "Applying for a Fishing Loan," "Retirement Plans: Preparing for the Future," "Connecticut's Recreational Boating Industry: An Economic Evaluation" (By Norman K. Bender and John Auble), "The Institutional Structure of New York State's Clam Industry" (1976), "Selecting a Health Insurance Plan That Fits Your Needs," Manuscript "Considering Farm Enterpries Profitability and Viability Factors" (by Norman K. Bender), "1998 Survey of Connectuct Dairy Farmers: Summary of Alternative or Non-Traditional Activities" and "Alternative and Non-Traditional Agricultural Activities on Connecticut Dairy Farms" (Marilyn A. Altobello and Norman K. Bender), "Developing Nature-Based Tourism in Eastern Connecticut" (by Norman K. Bender and Nini Davis, 1995);

Publications from Marine Advisory Service: "MAS: The Connecticut Charter Boat Fleet: Its Chara cteristics, Costs and Returns," "MAS: Obtaining Financial Assistance for Commercial Fishing, Charter, and Party Boat Operations," "MAS: Tax Management for Commecrial Fishermen," "MAS: Obtaining Financial Assistance for Commercial Fishing and Charter Boat Operations;" Publication from IRS: "Tax Guide for Commercial Fishermen" (1982); Publication "Sea Grant Profile in-depth" (by Norman K. Bender); "Land Use Issues and Alternatives in the Northeast: Coastal Land Use Issues" (by Norman K. Bender, Kenneth V. Gardner, Chester L. Arnold, Jr., and Heather M. Crawford); "Boating in Connecticut: Connecticut Boat Owners and Their Vessels," "Boating in Connecticut: "The Connecticut Shore-Based Marina Industry" and "Advisory Handbook on Fishing Financial Management" (All by Edward Ueber and Raymond O.P. Farrish); "Boating in Connecticut: The Shore-Based Marina Industry;" "Old Saybrook's Marine Commercial Waterfront: Its Value to the Town, Current Economic Conditions and Future Prospects" (By John A. Auble and Norman K. Bender); Periodical "National Fisherman" Vol. 59, no. 7 (Nov. 1978); newsletter "Coastlines: New York State Sea Grant Institute, State University of New York and Cornell University" (Issues: Vol. 5, no. 6 (Nov.-Dec. 1974), Vol. 6, no. 2 (March-Apr. 1975), Vol. 6, no. 3 (May-Jun. 1975)); "Stripers: The Economic Value of the Atlantic Coast Commercial and Recreational Striped Bass Fisheries" (Ed. Virgil Norton, Terry Smith and Ivan Strand); "University of Connecticut Cooperative Extension Service: Long Range Planning Report: Summary Report of the Long Range Planning Committee September 4, 1986 - June 16, 1987," and "Long Range Planning Report June 16, 1987;" "The Region's Economy: 1984: Southeastern Connecticut Regional Planning Agency;" "The Connecticut Dairy Industry: Issues and Challenges;" periodical "Connecticut Life Styles" Vol. 90, no. 3; periodical "Sea Grant Today" Vol. 10, no. 4 (July/Aug. 1980); "Marketing (Agricultural Tourism and Direct Marketing): Agricultural Issues in Connecticut Forum March 20, 1998;" periodical "Home & Garden News" (July/Aug. 2001); "Grower: New England Vegetable and Small Fruit newsletter" Vol. 96, no. 1 (Jan. 1996); "Nor'Easter: Magazine of the Northeast Sea Grant Programs" Vol. 4, no. 1 (Spriong 1992); "College of Agriculture and National Resources Journal" Vol. 2, no. 6 (Nov./Dec. 1995); "Shaping the Future: A Strategic Plan for National Resouces and Environmental Management Education;" "The Country Agent: Official Publication of National Association of County Agricultural Agents" Vol. LIII, no. 3 (Summer 1992);
Schedule for CES: MAS event "Fishermen's Financial Management Workshop;" Videocassette "Long Island Sound: Worth Fighting For!" (30 Min. CPTV documentary by Connecticut Sea Grant);

Correspondence from Norman K. Bender to commercial fishermen (May 1980); Norman K. Bender's notes on "May 19, 1983 IRS/OSG Tax Guide Review Meeting;" Notes for 1978 Tax Guide meeting; Correspondence from J.E. Easley, Jr., Agricultural Extension Service; Correspondence between Norman K. Bender and Roger Adams on "Nature-Based Tourism in Eastern Connecticut,"flier on the "National Sea Grant Adcisory Service;" Flier by Norman K. Bender on "The Capital Construction Fund;" flier "Agricultural Tourism; Opportunities for Farmers and Rural Communities;" program for "Conference on Environmental Enhancement through Agriculture: November 15-17, 1995, Boston, Massachusetts."
